reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the personal information collected by the app when creating a The Pocket Mentor membership.
reply.reference: The following personal information is collect when creating a The Pocket Mentor membership: -> Name -> Email address -> Payment details -> Postcode. URL: https://www.pocketmentorapp.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states the legal basis for collecting personal data, including consent, contract, and legitimate interests. It also mentions the purposes of data collection and use such as providing timely information, improving user experience, conducting surveys, offering gift subscriptions, customer service communication, and complying with legal obligations.
reply.reference: The privacy policy mentions under 'Legal basis for collecting this personal data' the different legal grounds for processing personal information and the purposes of data collection and use. URL: https://www.pocketmentorapp.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data by using the unsubscribe link in the email received from The Pocket Mentor.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that users can opt out of data collection or delete data by using the provided unsubscribe link in emails.
reply.reference: If you do not want to receive any further information from The Pocket Mentor and would like us to remove your name from our mailing list, use the unsubscribe link in the email you have received. URL: https://www.pocketmentorapp.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties such as Stripe and Mail Chimp.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that personal information is shared with third party software integrations like Stripe and Mail Chimp.
reply.reference: By creating your The Pocket Mentor membership you give consent to share your personal information with our third party software integrations Stripe and Mail Chimp for the purposes of creating and maintaining your account. URL: https://www.pocketmentorapp.com/privacy-policy/
